name: the-ultimate-laser-guide
description: a step by step guide for using the co2 laser @ University of Applied Sciences Potsdam (Germany)

scripts.pandoc: pandoc README.mdown --template=template.tex -V lang=ngerman --latex-engine=xelatex --filter pandoc-fignos -V toc-title="Inhalt" -V linkcolor="MidnightBlue"  -o The-Ultimate-Laser-Guide.pdf
